text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the provisions of this title concerning poultry and poultry products shall apply also to rabbits and rabbit products.

section.section: Upon the request of any person, the Secretary may provide antemortem, postmortem, and processing inspection of rabbit and rabbit products to protect consumers from adulterated products.
Any person who requests inspection shall pay the Secretary the cost of the inspection.
